content:
Sure, there are several authentic Malabar dishes that you can try at Salkara Restaurant. Here are some of the dishes that you should not miss:

1. Malabar Prawn Curry: It is a popular seafood dish made with prawns, coconut milk, and a variety of spices.

2. Njandu Roast: This dish consists of crab marinated in a blend of spices and roasted to perfection.

3. Chicken Fry: One of the most popular dishes in Kerala, Chicken Fry is made with marinated chicken, red chili powder, turmeric, and other spices.

4. Puttu and Kadala Curry: This is a traditional breakfast dish in Kerala, made with steamed rice flour and served with Kadala Curry, a gravy made of black chickpeas.

5. Malabar Parotta and Chicken Curry: Malabar Parotta is a flaky and layered Indian flatbread, while Chicken Curry is made with chicken, coconut milk, and a blend of spices.

These are just a few of the many delicious options available at Salkara Restaurant, and you can also consult with their staff if you need help deciding what to order.
